RowTranslations.originContent: # PPTAgent: Generating and Evaluating Presentations Beyond Text-to-Slides

Content: We present PPTAgent, an innovative system that automatically generates presentations from documents. Drawing inspiration from human presentation creation methods, our system employs a two-step process to ensure excellence in overall quality. Additionally, we introduce **PPTEval**, a comprehensive evaluation framework that assesses presentations across multiple dimensions. > [!TIP] > ğŸš€ Get started quickly with our pre-built Docker image - [See Docker instructions](DOC.md/#docker-) ## Open Source ğŸ¤— We have released the **PPTAgent code model** along with the datasets: [PPTAgent-Coder](https://huggingface.co/Forceless/PPTAgent-coder-3B), [Zenodo10k](https://huggingface.co/datasets/Forceless/Zenodo10K), and [pptagent-code26k](https://huggingface.co/datasets/Forceless/pptagent-code26k). ## Demo Video ğŸ¥ https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c3935a98-4d2b-4c46-9b36-e7c598d14863 ## Distinctive Features âœ¨ - **Dynamic Content Generation**: Creates slides with seamlessly integrated text and images - **Smart Reference Learning**: Leverages existing presentations without requiring manual annotation - **Comprehensive Quality Assessment**: Evaluates presentations through multiple quality metrics ## Case Study ğŸ’¡ - #### [Iphone 16 Pro](https://www.apple.com/iphone-16-pro/)

RowTranslations.originContent: We present PPTAgent, an innovative system that automatically generates presentations from documents. Drawing inspiration from human presentation creation methods, our system employs a two-step process to ensure excellence in overall quality. Additionally, we introduce **PPTEval**, a comprehensive evaluation framework that assesses presentations across multiple dimensions.

RowTranslations.originContent: > ğŸš€ Get started quickly with our pre-built Docker image - [See Docker instructions](DOC.md/#docker-)

We have released the **PPTAgent code model** along with the datasets: [PPTAgent-Coder](https://huggingface.co/Forceless/PPTAgent-coder-3B), [Zenodo10k](https://huggingface.co/datasets/Forceless/Zenodo10K), and [pptagent-code26k](https://huggingface.co/datasets/Forceless/pptagent-code26k).
- **Dynamic Content Generation**: Creates slides with seamlessly integrated text and images
- **Smart Reference Learning**: Leverages existing presentations without requiring manual annotation
- **Comprehensive Quality Assessment**: Evaluates presentations through multiple quality metrics

## PPTAgent ğŸ¤– PPTAgent follows a two-phase approach: 1. **Analysis Phase**: Extracts and learns from patterns in reference presentations 2. **Generation Phase**: Develops structured outlines and produces visually cohesive slides Our system's workflow is illustrated below: ![PPTAgent Workflow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icip-cas/PPTAgent/main/resource/fig2.jpg) ## PPTEval âš–ï¸

Content:
PPTEval evaluates presentations across three dimensions: - **Content**: Check the accuracy and relevance of the slides. - **Design**: Assesses the visual appeal and consistency. - **Coherence**: Ensures the logical flow of ideas. The workflow of PPTEval is shown below:
